statements: UPDATE device_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE device_id = 'c481f7f3-81ff-47dc-b12d-c1738c9262d9';
UPDATE device_interaction_data SET interaction_data = '{"action": "swipe", "direction": "left"}' WHERE user_id = 'be29d217-a7d5-4a48-b087-789a2e8d1c44';

UPDATE device_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_data = '{"click_count": 10}' WHERE device_id = '7f7f80d7-cb05-4e1f-b7d1-f1c5e2efa776' AND user_id = 'b2596e02-8c80-4b25-835e-1ee0fd482a36';

UPDATE device_interaction_data SET interaction_time = '2022-05-15 08:30:00', interaction_data = '{"interaction_notes": "User feedback received"}' WHERE user_id = '5e2c97c2-97ef-4b23-8d87-d0b5bb7f1dc8' AND device_id = '31c60d92-a930-4bea-a324-c959fb4d1e17';
UPDATE device_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_time = '2022-11-30 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 123 AND device_id = 456;
UPDATE biometric_recognition_data SET biometric_data = '{"fingerprint": "xxx-123", "iris": "xyz-456"}' WHERE user_id = 789 AND biometric_type = 'biometric_face';
UPDATE device_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_data = '{"click_count": 10}' WHERE device_id = 1 AND user_id = 123;
UPDATE biometric_recognition_data SET biometric_type = 'fingerprint', biometric_data = '{"quality": 90}' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE device_interactions SET interaction_type='Login' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_value='85%' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE device_interactions SET interaction_type='click', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id=101 AND device_id=10;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_value='80', timestamp='2021-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=201 AND biometric_type='heart_rate';
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET device_name = 'New Device Name' WHERE device_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET device_type = 'updated_type', device_name = 'updated_name' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = decode('EFGH', 'hex') WHERE data_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET last_interaction = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', device_name = 'Smartphone' WHERE device_id = 101;
